page.description: Rounds a decimal number up to the specified number of decimal places.
page.syntax: Value as N = ROUND_UP(N number,N decimal_places)

argument.name: number
argument.description: The initial number with decimal digits.

argument.name: decimal_places
argument.description: The number of significant digits to display after the decimal point.

page.discussion: The ROUND_UP() function rounds up a number with decimal places to bigger number with fewer decimal places.
